definition: A phenomenon or occurrence that is perceptible to the senses, often referring to the appearance or manifestation of something in a visible or tangible form. It is commonly used to describe the physical appearance of a person, object, or event, as well as the manifestation of a concept or idea.

examples.german: Die Erscheinung des Vollmonds am Himmel war atemberaubend.
examples.english: The appearance of the full moon in the sky was breathtaking.

examples.german: Die Erscheinung des neuen Smartphones wurde mit großer Spannung erwartet.
examples.english: The release of the new smartphone was eagerly anticipated.

examples.german: Die Erscheinung des Geistes löste Angst und Schrecken aus.
examples.english: The apparition of the ghost caused fear and terror.

examples.german: Die Erscheinung des Buches hat eine große Leserschaft angezogen.
examples.english: The publication of the book has attracted a large readership.

examples.german: Die Erscheinung des Regenbogens nach dem Sturm war ein wunderschöner Anblick.
examples.english: The appearance of the rainbow after the storm was a beautiful sight.
